about_the_game: Step into your favorite universes in Deckforge - the ultimate digital card game platform! Collect unique cards, build powerful decks, and challenge players from around the world in fast-paced, strategic battles. Customize all of the different games for fun that never ends on Deckforge. Join the community today and embark on your own epic journey!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5350U (2 * 1800) or equivalent; Intel Core i5-2400S (4 * 2500) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000 or equivalent; Radeon HD 6750M (512 VRAM) or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 (4 * 3200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M390 (2048 VRAM) equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Deckforge is the first digital card game platform. The MadGate is our first game available on Deckforge. Based on the popular new "Voyce me" series, you control adventurers and monsters alike in an epic clash of heroes and villains.
